Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Domina Home Royal in Positano, you'll be by the sea and minutes from Fornillo Beach and Church of Santa Maria Assunta. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Spiaggia Grande and Marina Longa of Tordigliano.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 66 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Private bathrooms with showers feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and an outdoor tennis court. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fornillo Beach - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Church of Santa Maria Assunta - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Spiaggia Grande - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Marina Longa of Tordigliano - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
La Gavitella - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Church of San Gennaro - 4 km / 2.5 mi

Faito Mountain - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi

Church of San Michele - 6 km / 3.7 mi

Tartaruga Beach - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Domina Home Royal is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 32.4 km / 20.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Domina Home Royal is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 32.5 km / 20.2 mi.
